job.title: Software Developer - Web Applications II
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: ResponsibilitiesDesign, develop and maintain the UX for various applicationsEnsure responsive implementationApply client-side design approaches that enables applications to be scalable on the dimensions of data and usersDesign client-side solutions using established brand and design guidelines to ensure UX consistencyEnsure client-side product quality by doing comprehensive UI testing with automationDefine the WEB APIs necessary to support the UXSource ideas from the open source community to help keep the product suite currentEnsure that client-side applications adhere to security standards and guidelinesEnsure that client-side applications adhere to coding standardsCollaborate with fellow developers, designers and analysts to solve problemsExperienceThe ideal candidate would possess the following:Minimum 5 years of industry experience working with complex web tiers in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SVGExtensive experience using TypeScript with Angular 11+ and Bootstrap Experience applying design patterns to develop and support web pages that run on multiple browsers including mobile/handheld devicesExperience building high-traffic, scalable, and high-performance Web sitesExperience developing solutions using an Agile approach, like ScrumExperience apply security technologies such as TLS, SAML and OAuth2 and OpenIDSkills And QualificationsThe ideal candidate would have some experience or familiarity with the following front-end technologies:Excellent Web development skills using JavaScript, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, .lessStrong knowledge of TypeScript with Angular Responsive UI design and development using BootstrapKnowledge of RESTful services and Web API'sBuild tooling: Grunt, Bower, NPMTesting: mocha, karmaFamiliarity with API frameworks such as Swagger or RAMLPowered by JazzHR6PaMW6WOuV
